${modID}:Corestone.NAME: Corestone
${modID}:Corestone.FLAVOR: You can hear faint, ethereal sounds from within.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain 3 #yInvincible until you play a card.

${modID}:BottledSin.NAME: Bottled Sin
${modID}:BottledSin.FLAVOR: Hatred calls out from it's glass prison, beckoning you to remove the stopper.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, choose a #rCurse. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
Choose a card for

in your hand.

${modID}:ParanoiasBox.NAME: Paranoia's Box
${modID}:ParanoiasBox.FLAVOR: The fumes seeping from within give you an immense feeling of dread.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yPandora's #yBox. At the end of combat, choose #b3 cards in your deck to permanently #yTransform.

${modID}:BottledMoth.NAME: Bottled Moth
${modID}:BottledMoth.FLAVOR: The bottle doesn't actually have a cork to keep the moth in. It seems to just like you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, choose a #ycost #y0 #ycard. Start each combat with this card in your hand, then draw #b1 card.
Choose a card for
Start each combat with
in your hand, then draw #b1 card.

${modID}:SprightedTiara.NAME: Sprighted Tiara
${modID}:SprightedTiara.FLAVOR: It sparkles with faint electricity around the tips.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, deal #b5 damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:BlackIndigonium.NAME: Black Indigonium
${modID}:BlackIndigonium.FLAVOR: It is black as midnight, despite the prismatic nature of the environment it forms in.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, choose #b2 cards in your deck. Playing one also plays the other.
Become #rCursed - #rPrisma #rDisruption [REMOVE_SPACE].
Become #rCursed - #rAscender's #rBane [REMOVE_SPACE].
Choose 2 cards for
Whenever you play
or
[REMOVE_SPACE], play the other as well.

${modID}:AdventuringPaint.NAME: Adventuring Paint
${modID}:AdventuringPaint.FLAVOR: You know what? I think what we need right now is a bit of music to lighten the mood!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn while following #yThe #yLine [REMOVE_SPACE]. #yThe #yLine #bknows #bthe #bbest #bpath #bfor #byou.

${modID}:MidnightBrew.NAME: Midnight Brew
${modID}:MidnightBrew.FLAVOR: The smell is indescribable. You're abhorred by it's presence.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 Potion slot. Obtain #b1 #rVial #rof #rNight [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:FadedStarmap.NAME: Faded Starmap
${modID}:FadedStarmap.FLAVOR: By the light of the stars, you will find your path.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you have no #yStarlight, Channel #b1 #yStarlight.

${modID}:FiftyEightLeafClover.NAME: 58 Leaf Clover
${modID}:FiftyEightLeafClover.FLAVOR: This is hardly even a clover at this point.
DESCRIPTIONS: Elite enemies always give #yRare card rewards.

${modID}:BonfireHearth.NAME: Bonfire Hearth
${modID}:BonfireHearth.FLAVOR: Your heartbeat has a strange, empowering warmth.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, gain #b15% Max HP.

${modID}:GoldenCookie.NAME: Golden Cookie
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b300 #yGold at the start of combat. Lose #b40 #yGold at the end of your turns.

${modID}:ChippedJade.NAME: Chipped Jade
${modID}:ChippedJade.FLAVOR: A few scrapes here and there, but it still sparkles as brightly as ever.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time a card is played each combat that costs #b3 or more, gain [E] [E] and draw #b2 cards.

${modID}:Shiitake.NAME: Shiitake
${modID}:Shiitake.FLAVOR: "I highly recommend this with a pinch of salt." - Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turns. Lose #b3 maximum hand size.

${modID}:Neloprephine.NAME: Neloprephine
${modID}:Neloprephine.FLAVOR: Doesn't numb the pain, but keeps you on your feet.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of Boss and Elite combats, gain #b4 #yRegen [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:GlassGuonStone.NAME: Glass Guon Stone
${modID}:GlassGuonStone.FLAVOR: Shockingly impact resistant, yet prone to shattering.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you haven't lost HP this combat, gain #b4 #yBlock [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:MarauderAnt.NAME: Marauder Ant
${modID}:MarauderAnt.FLAVOR: It's impressive size is matched only by it's equally impressive strength.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you do not play any #yAttacks during your turn, gain #b8 #yBlock [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:Yumako.NAME: Yumako
${modID}:Yumako.FLAVOR: Best to maintain it's freshness, or it will spoil quite quickly.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you climb a floor, gain #b18 #yGold [REMOVE_SPACE]. No longer works if you climb 3 floors without adding a card to your deck.

${modID}:AshCoveredBuckler.NAME: Ash Covered Buckler
${modID}:AshCoveredBuckler.FLAVOR: The charred wood is still smoldering, even so long after the battle.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you end your turn with #b25 or more #yBlock [REMOVE_SPACE], gain #b2 #yStrength [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:CosmicStrawberry.NAME: Cosmic Strawberry
${modID}:CosmicStrawberry.FLAVOR: "Uhh, this one is clearly inedible." - Ranwid
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, play a random #yRare card in your draw pile.

${modID}:Blacklight.NAME: Blacklight
${modID}:Blacklight.FLAVOR: The wavelengths can be impressively volatile, given prolonged exposure.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPoison triggers when it is applied, and reduces by #b2 instead of #b1 [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:ElectricFurnace.NAME: Electric Furnace
${modID}:ElectricFurnace.FLAVOR: Finally! An effective way to process this iron!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a cost #b3 or higher card, Channel #b1 #yPlasma [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:RadHazard.NAME: Rad Hazard
${modID}:RadHazard.FLAVOR: Only a scale replica of the original watercraft, but just as slippery and swift as ever.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, discard your #gGreen cards then draw that many cards. Reduce your maximum hand size by #b1 this turn whenever you shuffle your draw pile.

${modID}:StrangeDiamond.NAME: Strange Diamond
${modID}:StrangeDiamond.FLAVOR: Even in the dark, it seems to shine as if light is passing through it.
DESCRIPTIONS: After playing #b10 cards while in #yDivinity [REMOVE_SPACE], enter #yDivinity at the start of your next turn.

${modID}:BigDonut.NAME: Big Donut
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by #b21 without healing.

${modID}:AlloyWorshipUnit.NAME: Alloy Worship Unit
${modID}:AlloyWorshipUnit.FLAVOR: A former Solus core, overridden and refitted for new purpose.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain temporary #yStrength equal to the cost of the cards in your hand. Whenever you play an #yAttack, lose #b1 HP.

${modID}:SleepingButterfly.NAME: Sleeping Butterfly
${modID}:SleepingButterfly.FLAVOR: Try not to wake her up, she's had a long day.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yRest, you may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel.

${modID}:BottledBorealis.NAME: Bottled Borealis
${modID}:BottledBorealis.FLAVOR: The inside glimmers with chromatic light, just as beautiful as the jar it's contained by.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, choose a #yShop or #pExotic card. Start each combat with this card in your hand.
Choose a card for
Start each combat with
in your hand.

${modID}:FabricWings.NAME: Fabric Wings
${modID}:FabricWings.FLAVOR: A dream come true! So long as your dream doesn't involve actually flying.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b2 #yBlock whenever you play a #ycost #y0 #ycard [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:RyeBread.NAME: Rye Bread
${modID}:RyeBread.FLAVOR: Now, if I recall correctly, there was a bakery nearby. I said to him, "Orville, let me go get you some rye bread." Now, I'm unsure if elephants enjoy rye bread, but I assure you that Orville does. Now, this was on a Tuesday, which was good, because rye bread was always fresh on Tuesday. They made sourdough bread on Monday, and threw it out Wednesday... Or rather, they sold it at a discount for people wanting to feed it to the ducks, and then, prob'ly at the end of the day, finally, they threw it all out. I-I don't recall.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #ySkill [REMOVE_SPACE], deal #b1 damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:AntennaHeadband.NAME: Antenna Headband
${modID}:AntennaHeadband.FLAVOR: Feathery and pretty! May cause sound sensitivity.
DESCRIPTIONS: You may take any amount of actions at #yRest #ySites. Lose #b2 Max HP after taking an action at a #yRest #ySite [REMOVE_SPACE].

${modID}:Americano.NAME: Americano
${modID}:Americano.FLAVOR: Eugh, who the hell can even drink this?
DESCRIPTIONS: Starter Strikes and Defends cost #b0.

${modID}:Ankh.NAME: Ankh
${modID}:Ankh.FLAVOR: An ancient symbol of eternal life.
DESCRIPTIONS: While you are not in a #yStance [REMOVE_SPACE], you can no longer be debuffed.
